item.title: Chrome Hacks
item.description:
Most of the time you spend on your laptop is generally spent inside of Google Chrome.

After looking into my RescueTime activity I realised I spend around 50% of my time at my laptop inside of Google Chrome.

1 - I’m sure I’m not the only one 2 - I might have learned some cool tricks over time 3 - My tricks might turn out to be useful to you 4 - I might be missing out on something
